name: part_007
file: tmp_【#マリン出航3DLIVE】ゲストとワイワイ！Marine Set Sail!! Concert!!【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [vLGCYbnYhPg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Houshou Marine, Minato Aqua, and Ookami Mio perform 'Usseewa'.
Marine introduces Aqua and Mio, and they discuss their frustrations with society.
Houshou Marine and Nakiri Ayame perform 'Sorairo Days'.

subtitles.original: うっせぇわ
subtitles.english: Usseewa

subtitles.original: 身体ならば言葉の銃口を
subtitles.english: If it's my body, I'll put the muzzle of words...

subtitles.original: その頭に突き付けて撃てば
subtitles.english: ...against your head and fire!

subtitles.original: マジヤバない？ 止まれやしない
subtitles.english: Isn't it seriously bad? I won't stop.

subtitles.original: 不平不満垂れて成れの果て
subtitles.english: Complaining and grumbling, look what you've become.

subtitles.original: サディスティックに変貌する精神
subtitles.english: A mind that transforms sadistically.

subtitles.original: クソだりぃな
subtitles.english: It's so damn annoying.

subtitles.original: 酒が空いたグラスあればすぐに注ぎなさい
subtitles.english: If there's an empty glass, pour some sake immediately.

subtitles.original: 皆がつまみやすいように串外しなさい
subtitles.english: Remove the skewers so everyone can easily grab the snacks.

subtitles.original: 会計や注文は先陣を切る
subtitles.english: Be the first to settle the bill or order.

subtitles.original: 不文律最低限のマナーです
subtitles.english: It's an unwritten rule, the bare minimum of manners.

subtitles.original: はぁ？うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
subtitles.english: Huh? Shut up, shut up, shut up!

subtitles.original: 成功は口癖じゃ限界で
subtitles.english: Saying "success" is just a habit, I'm at my limit.

subtitles.original: 絶対絶対現代の代弁者は私やろがい
subtitles.english: I'm definitely the spokesperson for this modern era!

subtitles.original: もう見飽きたわ 二番煎じかのパロディ
subtitles.english: I'm tired of seeing these second-hand parodies.

subtitles.original: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
subtitles.english: Shut up, shut up, shut up!

subtitles.original: 丸々と肉付いたその顔面にバツ
subtitles.english: A cross on that fat, fleshy face of yours!

subtitles.original: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
subtitles.english: Shut up, shut up, shut up!

subtitles.original: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
subtitles.english: Shut up, shut up, shut up!

subtitles.original: 私が俗に言う天才です
subtitles.english: I'm what people call a genius.

subtitles.original: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
subtitles.english: Shut up, shut up, shut up!

subtitles.original: あなたが思うより健康です
subtitles.english: I'm healthier than you think.

subtitles.original: 一切合切凡庸なあなたじゃ分からないかもね
subtitles.english: You, who are so mediocre, probably won't understand any of it.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼つまらねぇ
subtitles.english: Ah, how boring.

subtitles.original: 何回聞かせるんだそのメモリー
subtitles.english: How many times are you going to make me listen to that memory?

subtitles.original: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
subtitles.english: Shut up, shut up, shut up!

subtitles.original: アタシも大概だけど
subtitles.english: I'm quite something too, but...

subtitles.original: どうだっていいぜ問題はなし
subtitles.english: Whatever, there's no problem.

subtitles.original: はい！というわけで、あくたんとミオ先輩が来てくれました！
subtitles.english: Hi! So, Akutan and Mio-senpai have joined us!

subtitles.original: はーい！ありがとう！来たよー！
subtitles.english: Hi! Thank you! We're here!

subtitles.original: せっかくこの三人で揃ったので、社会への不満を叫びましょう！
subtitles.english: Since the three of us are here, let's shout out our frustrations with society!

subtitles.original: 社会への不満！？
subtitles.english: Frustrations with society!?

subtitles.original: 社会への不満かー。
subtitles.english: Frustrations with society, huh...

subtitles.original: じゃあ船長からいきますよ。
subtitles.english: Then I'll go first.

subtitles.original: あるんだ。何だろう？
subtitles.english: You have some? I wonder what.

subtitles.original: バーナス、ミカンの次は、タラ！！
subtitles.english: Barnas, Mikan, and then... TARA!!

subtitles.original: それ普通にあの、社長への不満じゃんそれは！
subtitles.english: That's just a frustration with the CEO!

subtitles.original: あ、じゃあ、ミオ先輩ありますか？
subtitles.english: Oh, then, Mio-senpai, do you have any?

subtitles.original: えー、なんだろうなー。お、あ、あるあるある。やろう。
subtitles.english: Hmm, what could it be... Oh, wait, I have one. Let's do it.

subtitles.original: お、いきます？はい。
subtitles.english: Oh, you're going? Okay.

subtitles.original: オオカミ、周りが遠吠えしたら、なぜか勝手に遠吠えしてしまーう！！
subtitles.english: As a wolf, when others around me howl, I somehow end up howling too without thinking!!

subtitles.original: あ、本当の社会の話。
subtitles.english: Oh, a story about real society.

subtitles.original: 嫌だったんだね、実は嫌だったんだ。
subtitles.english: So you hated it. Actually, you hated it.

subtitles.original: 不思議だなーと思って。
subtitles.english: I just thought it was strange.

subtitles.original: 嫌だったんだね。
subtitles.english: So you hated it.

subtitles.original: え、あくたん何かありますか？
subtitles.english: Uh, Akutan, do you have anything?

subtitles.original: 社会への不満かー。うーん。あ、分かりました。
subtitles.english: Frustrations with society, huh... Hmm. Oh, I've got it.

subtitles.original: お、なんだろう。
subtitles.english: Oh, I wonder what it is.

subtitles.original: いいですか？お願いします！
subtitles.english: Ready? Please!

subtitles.original: ボッチで何が悪い！！
subtitles.english: WHAT'S WRONG WITH BEING A LONER!!

subtitles.original: 社長ー！！あくたん！！
subtitles.english: CEO!! Akutan!!

subtitles.original: あくたん、ぼっちじゃないよ！
subtitles.english: Akutan, you're not a loner!

subtitles.original: そうだよ、私たちがついてる！
subtitles.english: That's right, we're with you!

subtitles.original: 二人ともー！
subtitles.english: You two...!

subtitles.original: 付いてますよ社長！
subtitles.english: We're with you, CEO!

subtitles.original: あ、すみません、ちょっともう時間なんで帰ってもらっていいですか？
subtitles.english: Oh, sorry, we're out of time, so could you please head back?

subtitles.original: あ、社長、行きましょう、帰り。時間なんで。
subtitles.english: Oh, CEO, let's go, let's head back. It's time.

subtitles.original: えー！嫌だ嫌だ嫌だ！待って待って！
subtitles.english: What! No, no, no! Wait, wait!

subtitles.original: いってらっしゃーい！バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Have a safe trip! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: 空色デイズ
subtitles.english: Sorairo Days

subtitles.original: 君は聞こえる？
subtitles.english: Can you hear it?

subtitles.original: 僕のこの声が
subtitles.english: This voice of mine?

subtitles.original: 闇に虚しく吸い込まれた
subtitles.english: Empty, it was swallowed by the darkness.

subtitles.original: もしも世界が意味を持つのなら
subtitles.english: If the world were to have a meaning...

subtitles.original: こんな気持ちも無駄ではない
subtitles.english: Then even these feelings wouldn't be in vain.

subtitles.original: 憧れに押しつぶされて
subtitles.english: Crushed by my yearnings,

subtitles.original: 諦めてたんだ
subtitles.english: I had given up.

subtitles.original: 果てしない空の色も知らないで
subtitles.english: Without even knowing the color of the endless sky.

subtitles.original: 走り出した
subtitles.english: These feelings that started running,

subtitles.original: 思いが今でも
subtitles.english: even now,

subtitles.original: この胸の確かに叩いてるから
subtitles.english: they are surely beating in this chest.

subtitles.original: 今日も僕が
subtitles.english: Today, I will continue on

subtitles.original: その先に続く
subtitles.english: ahead,

subtitles.original: 僕なりの明日を築いていく
subtitles.english: building my own tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 答えはそう いつもここにある
subtitles.english: The answer is, yes, always right here.
